features: Lucky Brand fashion jewelry with etched metal detail and colored stone
body.description: Get ultra-feminine desert flair with this stunning turquoise-look blue stone collar necklace from Lucky Brand with alternating flowers and stones set in silver-tone mixed metal. Approximate length: 17" + 2" extender. Approximate drop: 5/8".

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #210,055 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #53 in Women's Collar Necklaces

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lucky Brand Jewelry The right piece of jewelry can elevate your look from everyday to extraordinary. Shop women's jewelry at Lucky Brand to find pieces that will do just that. Whether it's rings, bracelets, anklets or earrings, these original pieces have an authentic style that will add an edge to your outfit. Discover incredibly modern designs with handcrafted details like hammered metals, fine beading, tassels and more. Lucky Brand's timeless West Coast vibe perfectly translates into each design so every woman can enjoy self-assured quality and style. Look to Lucky for pieces that incorporate color and texture for a fantastic addition to your accessories' collection. Refresh Your Wardrobe with Jewelry For Women Looking to add some fresh fun into your wardrobe? Do it with cute jewelry from Lucky Brand. Explore a California collection of pieces crafted with love to elevate your style. Long earrings with turquoise details are beautiful with an up-do for a festive feel that works day or night. Take jeans and a tee from boring to show-stopping by adding a statement medallion or coin necklace. Turn heads with rings boasting cool colorful stones and textured detail. Wear them stacked or alone for an effortlessly boho-chic vibe that works for the office, park, bar, or concert. Jewelry Created With Love For You Check out Lucky Brand for in-style jewelry that boasts both modern looks and impeccable craftsmanship. Luxurious materials such as silver, titanium and more are durable for everyday wear but elegant for a designer-quality look. Necklaces, rings, earrings and bracelets alike feature semi-precious stones such as pearls, turquoise, and jade. Powerful clasps and hooks keep each piece in place so you can wear without worry. Gorgeous, carefully crafted details like carvings, engravings, wraps, and even filigrees prove that each piece is made with love and attention. Discover a beautiful range of well-made and always stylish Lucky Brand pieces from bracelets and rings to chandelier earrings, charm necklaces and everything in between.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It looks nice with my other diamond necklace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This necklace looks expensive but was very affordable. I love how it looks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this necklace It is for holiday present for friend of mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It came on time.
reviews.reviewText: The necklace was just right as a Birthday gift for my daughter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, high quality
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a turquoise necklace for some time. There’s a lot of different kinds out there, but what made me choose this one was that it’s understated. A lot of turquoise necklaces can be too bold or busy. This one is classy enough to wear formal or casual. High quality silver. This is my new favorite

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely gorgeous! Sits perfectly across my collar bones. Doesn’t hug too close to the next or dangle too far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me.
reviews.reviewText: I returned it. It looked cheap and plastic-y.
